function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Resistance to monitoring and contact-tracing app adoption","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of contact tracing and disease containment","Mitigation":"Education about the benefits of contact tracing, transparent communication about data usage","Technologies":"Secure and privacy-preserving contact-tracing apps","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Crackdown on civil liberties and freedom of assembly","Impact":"Violation of human rights, potential for political suppression","Mitigation":"International monitoring and advocacy for human rights, legal challenges to unjust restrictions","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Civil society, political opposition","Owner":"Human rights organizations, legal advocates"},{"Description":"Changes in mobility patterns due to surveillance and tracking","Impact":"Reduction in surveillance effectiveness, potential for social division and fear","Mitigation":"Transparent and ethical use of surveillance, community engagement and dialogue","Technologies":"Ethical surveillance systems, data protection measures","People":"Racialized minorities, immigrants","Owner":"Community leaders, government, surveillance authorities"}]}
